as a huge counter strike palyer / fan i love this game it is known to be one of the most popular ones in the series and still going strong and thats true, but i for some reason find myself loving 1.6 and the old ones more than source just because they are more easy and newbie friendly, source however is brutal and full of players that shout and curse on microphone (sometimes), not to mention valve only changed the maps and characters and only added new ones to play as (seal team six) but all in all its awesome and i find it to be a good entry in the series
Straight forward , no bullshiting around with story or other stuff just choose your team ...choose your weapons,kick some ass and have some fun ... what more do you want.
Мне эта игра нравится больше кс 1.6 те что тут реальная физика и гравика хорошая а также целится удобней.А в остально кс лучше.

Old school, but still awesome. There's so much you can do, with hundreds upon hundreds of server side plugins available to provide a variety of different games modes from surfing to zombies to mini-games. Get it.
Still beats the counter strike global offensive by a long shot, but dead game don't waste your money.

Графический движок взят с Half Life 2, это придаёт игре больше красочности, графичности и не требует особо мощной системы. Всё тот же любимый всеми Counter-Strike, только тут уже и физика продуманная и красота персонажей и окружения и система повреждений. Мне также интересно в неё играть, как и в её предшественника, просто смотреть приятней на графику. Жаль нет линейного прохождения, как в Condition Zero(КС), но это не мешает людям рубиться в неё, так как по сетке веселее! Новый век, новые возможности, поэтому считаю, что разработчики сделали правильный выбор и применили новый движок.
A great game, definitely play this if your a fan of the series.

As in the original version of the game, Counter-Strike: Sourcе each other and oppose the team con terrorists (CT), the special forces) and a team of terrorists (T) in a series of rounds.
Each round is won through a mission, such as undermining bombs or rescue hostages or after the destruction of all members of the enemy team.
The gameplay is similar to that in Counter-Strike. Most of the weapons is also identical Counter-Strike 1.6 except shield, which was available con terrorists. In later versions of purchase of ammunition was produced automatically in the early rounds and the purchase of new weapons, issued full ammo (absolutely free). The total purchase price was lower. That caused indignation of the experienced gamers classical CS. The cartridges also you can fill up, returning to the place of purchase.

Un très bon jeu qui a su conserver toute sa saveur, même après tant d'années ! Les graphismes ainsi que la bande sonore ont certes pris beaucoup de rides, mais cela importe peu à vrai dire. Le gameplay lui n'a pas bougé d'un sourcil, et c'est tant mieux, les combats ont su garder toute leur nervosité et leur subtilité. On use et abuse des sauts, de la position accroupie ainsi que de la marche pour transformer vos adversaires en passoire sans qu'ils n'aient le temps de réagir. De même, la boutique permet de se payer du matos (Protections, fusils, pistolets, grenades).
Bref, un jeu qui promet de longues heures de frag et de fun !

Terroristi contro forze Antiterroristiche (CT). Un gioco che mi sento di consigliare a tutti gli amanti degli FPS. Gioco molto semplice senza troppi sofismi: hai la tua arma in mano, ora vai a sparare. Per questo motivo la differenza non la fa l'abilità speciale che hai, l'equipaggiamento più o meno potente; la differenza la fa la bravura del giocatore. 
Oltre alle classiche modalità a sparatoria in tutte le sue varianti mi sono divertito un sacco (e di certo le risate non sono mancate) a giocare nei server con la mod Hide n Seek: la squadra dei terroristi è trasformata in elementi del gioco (bottiglie, bidoni, alberi, cespugli ecc) e i CT devono trovarli!
